#cult #exjw #deconstruction #exchristian #highcontrolreligion #indigenous #apostate #jw #community #communitysupport #communitybuilding #rebuild #rebuildtrust #selftrust #selftrustjourney #therapy #religioustrauma #healing #healingjourney

episodes.title: Why Jehovah’s Witnesses Are a Cult: BITE MODEL
episodes.description:
Join me as I use Steven Hassan’s Combating Mind Control to define what a cult is, how it is different than a normal religious group, and what tactics it uses. We will go through the BITE method extensively (Behavior control, Information control, Thought control, and Emotional control) while going through a list of cited publications and content published by the Watchtower Bible and Tract Society to support claims made. The list I use can be found at jwfact.com. 




#cult #exjw #deconstruction #exchristian #highcontrolreligion #indigenous #apostate #jw #stevenhassan #combatingmindcontrol #bitemodel #behavior #information #thoughts #emotions #control #repentance #snitch #confession #time #pioneer #elder #ministerialservant #circuitoverseer #bethel #bethelite #governingbody #faithfulanddiscreetslave #anointed #144000 #rutherford #isolation #usvsthem #groupthink #binary #returnvisit #bible #biblestudy #biblestudent #missionaries #newlight #endtimes #rapture #disfellowship #disfellowshipping #shun #shunning #humanrights #freedomofreligion #supremecourt #australianroyalcommission #csa #coverup #judicialcommittee #service #servicereport

episodes.title: ExJehovah’s Witness Thoughts on Maslow’s Hierarchy and Indoctrination
episodes.description:
How do cults successfully indoctrinate and control people? Let’s take a look at the BITE model and Maslow’s Hierarchy to find out. 

#cult #exjw #deconstruction #exchristian #highcontrolreligion #indigenous #apostate #jw #exjehovahwitness #bitemodel #maslows_hierarchy_needs #indoctrination #psychology #brainwash #control #community #connection #selfactualization #survival

episodes.title: Leaving Jehovah's Witnesses: A Former Pioneer's Journey Out of the Cult, Part 3- Lesson In Humanity
episodes.description: In Part 3, I talk about the lessons I’ve learned through activism, what real love is and is not, and the real life consequences of following JW doctrine and policies, even when it means sacrificing your humanity.

episodes.title: Leaving Jehovah’s Witnesses: A Former Pioneer’s Journey Out of the Cult, Part 1
episodes.description: Hello, my name is Amoriya! I’m an activist and artist, I organize for Palestine and raise awareness for disability equity. My journey has led me to retell my journey in and out of the cult of Jehovah’s Witnesses. I was born into “the truth” and left during the pandemic when I was 23 years old. If my story can help even just one person in their own, then it was all worth it.

episodes.title: Leaving Jehovah’s Witnesses: A Former Pioneer’s Journey Out of the Cult, Part 2- Judicial Committee
